output.description: Directory where files will be saved. Supports <short_name> placeholder which is replaced with the filename (without extension).

go-output.description: Name of the generated Go file with embed directives.

go-mod.description: Package name for the generated Go file. If not specified, auto-detected from go.mod or existing .go files.

github-token.description: GitHub token for accessing private repositories. Supports environment variable expansion (e.g., $GITHUB_TOKEN or ${GITHUB_TOKEN}).

var-naming.description: Naming convention for generated Go variables.

files.description: List of URLs or local file paths to embed. Supports environment variable expansion.

items.description: URL or local file path. Environment variables like $VAR or ${VAR} are expanded.
